creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
Love to travel? From cheap hotel rooms to luxury holiday cottages, Hotels.com has the best travel app to book your summer holiday, last minute booking or a cheap trip.

EASILY FIND THE PERFECT STAY FOR YOUR TRIP
• We do more than just hotels! Book luxury holiday cottages, cheap motels, hostels and, of course, hotels -- from cheap rooms to unique boutiques!
• Compare prices before booking your trip
• Book your holiday or other travel in a few easy taps

COMPARE & BOOK LAST-MINUTE HOLIDAY & TRAVEL RESERVATIONS
• Get instant savings on bookings with Secret Prices
• Save 5%* on hotel or holiday rental reservations when you book on the app with code MOB5
• Get last minute travel deals with Tonight’s Local Deals
• Find flash sales for your last minute holiday trip
• Save on your trip with last minute travel deals

GET REWARDED WHEN BOOKING WITH HOTELS.COM
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward** night
• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from hotel chains and cheap hotels to holiday cottages and more

EASY TRAVEL BOOKING
• Save payment info for fast booking on your next trip
• Get instant notifications to confirm your booking ahead of your trip

AND MORE WHILE ON TRIP
• Manage your booking and travel details
• Plan your holiday with in-app Travel Guides

**The value of the reward night is the average daily rate of the 10 stamps collected excluding taxes and fees.

*MOB5 T&Cs: Enter coupon to get 5% off your booking when you book your reservation on the Hotels.com app. You can’t collect or redeem Rewards nights when you use this coupon on your reservation. You must pay for your stay when you make the reservation. This coupon can’t be used for package bookings. Go to http://www.hotels.com/page/hotel-exclusions/ for a list of non-participating hotels. There’s a limit of one coupon per booking. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (see hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html) and all bookings are subject to availability. Hotels.com is the promoter of this offer.

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation, and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.
descriptionShort: Fast and easy booking! Last minute travel deals for the perfect place to stay.

title: Hotels.com: Book hotels, flats, cottages and more

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
Love to travel? From cheap hotels to vacation rentals, Hotels.com has the best travel app to book your summer vacation resort, business trip hotel, or last minute room for tonight.

EASILY FIND THE PERFECT STAY FOR YOUR TRIP
• We do more than just hotels! Book vacation rentals, apartments, luxury resorts, B&Bs, motels, hostels and, yes, hotels - from cheap rooms to unique boutiques!
• Search and compare travel deals and hotel prices before making your reservation
• Make a reservation and book your travel in a few easy taps

GET LAST-MINUTE TRAVEL DEALS
• Get instant savings on reservations with Secret Prices
• Save 5%* on selected hotel bookings and vacation rentals when you book on the app with code MOB5
• Traveling tonight? Get last minute travel deals with Tonight’s Local Deals
• Find flash sales on your last minute holiday escapes
• Save on your trip with last minute travel deals

GET REWARDED WHEN BOOKING WITH HOTELS.COM
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward** night
• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from major hotel chains and beach resorts to villas, apartments and more

EASY RESERVATION & BOOKING
• Save payment details for fast booking on your next trip
• Get instant notifications to confirm your booking

AND MORE ON TRIP
• Manage your booking and reservation details, even offline
• Plan your upcoming trip or vacation with in-app Travel Guides

**The value of the reward night is the average daily rate of the 10 stamps collected excluding taxes and fees.

*MOB5 T&Cs: Enter coupon to get 5% off your booking at a participating Best Price Guarantee hotel when you book your holiday on the Hotels.com app. You can’t collect or redeem Rewards nights when you use this coupon. You must pay for your stay when you make the reservation. This coupon can’t be used for package bookings / reservations (e.g. with flights). Go to http://www.hotels.com/page/hotel-exclusions/ for a list of non-participating hotels. There’s a limit of one coupon per booking. It can be combined with discounted prices on Hotels.com but cannot be used with any other promotion on Hotels.com. Usual booking terms and conditions apply (see hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html) and all bookings are subject to availability. Hotels.com is the promoter of this offer.

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.
descriptionShort: Find the perfect place for your trip with last minute hotel & travel deals!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We've updated our app to make it easier for you to get information about travel restrictions and change your plans accordingly. Please check back frequently if you have concerns about current or future bookings.

title: Hotels.com: Book Hotel & Holiday Rental Deals!

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
Love to travel? From cheap hotel rooms to luxury holiday cottages, Hotels.com has the best travel app to book your summer holiday, last minute booking or a cheap trip.

EASILY FIND THE PERFECT STAY FOR YOUR TRIP
• We do more than just hotels! Book luxury holiday cottages, cheap motels, vacation rentals, hostels and, of course, hotels -- from cheap rooms to unique boutiques!
• Compare prices before booking your trip
• Book your holiday or other travel in a few easy taps

COMPARE & BOOK LAST-MINUTE HOLIDAY & TRAVEL RESERVATIONS
• Get instant savings on bookings with Secret Prices
• Get last minute travel deals with Tonight’s Local Deals
• Find flash sales for your last minute holiday trip
• Save on your trip with last minute travel deals

GET REWARDED WHEN BOOKING WITH HOTELS.COM
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward** night
• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from hotel chains and cheap hotels to holiday cottages and more

EASY TRAVEL BOOKING
• Save payment info for fast booking on your next trip
• Get instant notifications to confirm your booking ahead of your trip

AND MORE WHILE ON TRIP
• Manage your booking and travel details
• Plan your holiday with in-app Travel Guides

**The value of the reward night is the average daily rate of the 10 stamps collected excluding taxes and fees.


The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation, and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.

title: Hotels.com: Book Hotel & Holiday Rental Deals!

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
When you’re ready to travel again, the Hotels.com app has everything that you need to book the perfect place to stay.


Plus, our app is your perfect travel companion. Not only can you book on the go, but you can also change or cancel your booking and contact the property directly from the app.

That’s not all! You’ll find everything that you need to make your booking stress-free and your stay even more enjoyable.

SAVINGS AND DEALS
• You can instantly save an extra 10% with Secret Prices** on our app
• Use our ‘Tonight’s local deals’ feature to save on last-minute bookings

GET REWARDED WITH HOTELS.COM REWARDS
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward*** night! Collect a stamp for every night you stay at 1,000,000 eligible properties worldwide
• Get handy notifications as you progress towards your reward night
• There are no blackout dates to redeem your reward night
• Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at VIP Access properties

FIND A STAY THAT’S RIGHT FOR YOU
• Explore our range of apartments, holiday homes, resorts and more
• It’s easy to search for properties with our in-depth sort and filter options
• See the property’s location at a glance with our map view
• Read verified guest reviews
• Compare the features and prices of your favourite properties that you’ve saved

FAST, EASY AND SECURE BOOKINGS
• Pay now or later—you choose whether you want to pay online or at the property
• Save your payment details securely to book future stays even more quickly

ENJOY YOUR STAY
• Get booking confirmation and check-in notifications


**Secret Prices are available to Hotels.com app users, Hotels.com® Rewards members and individuals who unlock Secret Prices by subscribing to Hotels.com by email. Available on selected hotels and selected dates only. Subject to the full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html

***Hotels.com Rewards® is open only to individuals who are eighteen (18) and older. When you book and stay 1 night at eligible properties, you’ll get 1 stamp. Collect 10 stamps and you'll get 1 reward night to redeem at a Hotels.com Rewards® eligible pre-pay property (as identified on site). A redemption fee applies to each reward night, unless redeemed on the Hotels.com app. The maximum value of the reward night is the average daily rate of your ten (10) stamps collected excluding taxes and applicable fees. The value of your reward night doesn't count towards any applicable taxes or fees. Excludes package bookings (where available) and bookings made using a coupon. Your reward nights and/or your collected stamps will expire if you have not collected a stamp and/or redeemed a reward night using your Hotels.com® Rewards account in the previous 12 months. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html.

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.



** Members aged 18+. When you book and stay 1 night at eligible properties, you’ll get 1 stamp. Collect 10 stamps and get a reward night. Reward night value based on average daily rate of 10 stamps (excluding taxes/fees). Taxes/fees payable on reward night. A redemption fee applies unless redeemed on app. Booking exclusions apply. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html.

FAST, EASY AND SECURE BOOKINGS
• Pay now or later—you choose whether you want to pay online or at the property
• Save your payment details securely to book future stays even more quickly

ENJOY YOUR STAY
• Get booking confirmation and check-in notifications

*Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. Details on the app.

**Secret Prices are available to Hotels.com app users, Hotels.com® Rewards members and individuals who unlock Secret Prices by subscribing to Hotels.com by email. title: Hotels.com: Book Hotel & Holiday Rental Deals!

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
When you’re ready to travel again, the Hotels.com app has everything that you need to book the perfect place to stay.


Plus, our app is your perfect travel companion. Not only can you book on the go, but you can also change or cancel your booking and contact the property directly from the app.

That’s not all! You’ll find everything that you need to make your booking stress-free and your stay even more enjoyable.

SAVINGS AND DEALS
• You can instantly save an extra 10% with Secret Prices** on our app
• Use our ‘Tonight’s local deals’ feature to save on last-minute bookings

GET REWARDED WITH HOTELS.COM REWARDS
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward*** night! Collect a stamp for every night you stay at 1,000,000 eligible properties worldwide
• Get handy notifications as you progress towards your reward night
• There are no blackout dates to redeem your reward night
• Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at VIP Access properties

FIND A STAY THAT’S RIGHT FOR YOU
• Explore our range of apartments, holiday homes, resorts and more
• It’s easy to search for properties with our in-depth sort and filter options
• See the property’s location at a glance with our map view
• Read verified guest reviews
• Compare the features and prices of your favourite properties that you’ve saved

FAST, EASY AND SECURE BOOKINGS
• Pay now or later—you choose whether you want to pay online or at the property
• Save your payment details securely to book future stays even more quickly

*Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. Details on the app.

title: Hotels.com: Book Hotel & Holiday Rental Deals!

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
When you’re ready to travel again, the Hotels.com app has everything that you need to book the perfect place to stay.


Plus, our app is your perfect travel companion. Not only can you book on the go, but you can also change or cancel your booking and contact the property directly from the app.

That’s not all! You’ll find everything that you need to make your booking stress-free and your stay even more enjoyable.

EASILY FIND THE PERFECT STAY FOR YOUR TRIP
• We do more than just hotels! Book luxury holiday cottages, cheap motels, vacation rentals, hostels and, of course, hotels -- from cheap rooms to unique boutiques!
• Compare prices before booking your trip
• Book your holiday or other travel in a few easy taps

SAVINGS AND DEALS
• You can instantly save an extra 10% with Secret Prices** on our app
• Use our ‘Tonight’s local deals’ feature to save on last-minute bookings
• Get last minute travel deals with Tonight’s Local Deals
• Find flash sales for your last minute holiday trip
• Save on your trip with last minute travel deals

GET REWARDED WITH HOTELS.COM REWARDS
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward*** night! Collect a stamp for every night you stay at 1,000,000 eligible properties worldwide
• Get handy notifications as you progress towards your reward night
• There are no blackout dates to redeem your reward night
• Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at VIP Access properties
• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from hotel chains and cheap hotels to holiday cottages and more

FIND A STAY THAT’S RIGHT FOR YOU
• Explore our range of apartments, holiday homes, resorts and more
• It’s easy to search for properties with our in-depth sort and filter options
• See the property’s location at a glance with our map view
• Read verified guest reviews
• Compare the features and prices of your favourite properties that you’ve saved

FAST, EASY AND SECURE BOOKINGS
• Pay now or later—you choose whether you want to pay online or at the property
• Save your payment details securely to book future stays even more quickly

ENJOY YOUR STAY
• Get booking confirmation and check-in notifications

*Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. Details on the app.

**Secret Prices are available to Hotels.com app users, Hotels.com® Rewards members and individuals who unlock Secret Prices by subscribing to Hotels.com by email. Available on selected hotels and selected dates only. Subject to the full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html

***Members aged 18+. When you book and stay 1 night at eligible properties, you’ll get 1 stamp. Collect 10 stamps and get a reward night. Reward night value based on average daily rate of 10 stamps (excluding taxes/fees). Taxes/fees payable on reward night. A redemption fee applies unless redeemed on app. Booking exclusions apply. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html.

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.

title: Hotels.com: Book Hotel & Holiday Rental Deals!

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
Our app is even more rewarding for Hotels.com® Rewards members! You can get to your next reward* night faster with app exclusive offers and be sure to opt-in to notifications so you don't miss out!

When you’re ready to travel, take our app with you, after all, it’s your perfect travel companion.

SAVINGS & LAST-MINUTE TRAVEL DEALS ON OUR APP
• Get instant access to Secret Prices*! Save an extra 10% on thousands of properties worldwide
• “Tonight’s Local Deals” feature on our app is a great way to save on last minute bookings
• Enjoy the flexibility of free cancellation on most hotels*
• Search and compare travel deals and hotel prices before booking your trip

OUR APP IS EVEN MORE REWARDING
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward night on us
• Love reward nights? You can get them faster on our app with app exclusive offers
• You won’t pay a fee to redeem your reward nights on our app – and there are no blackout dates
• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from major hotel chains and beach resorts to villas, apartments and more
• Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at VIP Access properties

MORE THAN JUST HOTELS
• We do more than just hotels! Easily find vacation rentals, apartments, luxury resorts, B&Bs, motels, hostels and more on our app - we’ve got every kind of property for almost every kind of trip. So, whether it’s a short business trip or a long vacation, choose from over 1,000,000 properties worldwide.
• Filter by theme for different types of trips
• See the property’s location on a map and read verified guest reviews
• Save your favorite hotels, vacation rentals, resorts and more

FAST, EASY & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP
• It only takes a few taps to book your travel.
• Pay now or later on most hotels
• Choose to pay over 12 months with no interest
• Save your payment details to book future trips even faster

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION
• Save your confirmation and access your booking details anytime – even offline
• Easily manage your booking on the go
• Contact us or the property directly from the app
• Opt-in for push notifications and we’ll send you updates about your stay

* Hotels.com® Rewards Members 18+. When you book and stay 1 night at eligible properties, you’ll get 1 stamp. Collect 10 stamps and get a reward night. Reward night value based on average daily rate of 10 stamps (excluding taxes/fees). Taxes/fees payable on reward night. A redemption fee applies unless redeemed on app. Booking exclusions apply. Subject to full terms and conditions https://www.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html. Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. See property pages on app for details. Secret Prices are available to Hotels.com app users, members and email subscribers. Available on selected hotels and selected dates only. Subject to the full terms and conditions https://www.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalization, and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.

title: Hotels.com: Book Hotels, Vacation Rentals and More

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
When you’re ready to travel again, the Hotels.com app has everything that you need to book the perfect place to stay.


Plus, our app is your perfect travel companion. Not only can you book on the go, but you can also change or cancel your booking and contact the property directly from the app.

That’s not all! You’ll find everything that you need to make your booking stress-free and your stay even more enjoyable.

EASILY FIND THE PERFECT STAY FOR YOUR TRIP
• We do more than just hotels! Book luxury holiday cottages, cheap motels, vacation rentals, hostels and, of course, hotels -- from cheap rooms to unique boutiques!
• Compare prices before booking your trip
• Book your holiday or other travel in a few easy taps

SAVINGS AND DEALS
• You can instantly save an extra 10% with Secret Prices** on our app
• Use our ‘Tonight’s local deals’ feature to save on last-minute bookings
• Get last minute travel deals with Tonight’s Local Deals
• Find flash sales for your last minute holiday trip
• Save on your trip with last minute travel deals

GET REWARDED WITH HOTELS.COM REWARDS
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward*** night! Collect a stamp for every night you stay at 1,000,000 eligible properties worldwide
• Get handy notifications as you progress towards your reward night
• There are no blackout dates to redeem your reward night
• Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at VIP Access properties
• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from hotel chains and cheap hotels to holiday cottages and more

FIND A STAY THAT’S RIGHT FOR YOU
• Explore our range of apartments, holiday homes, resorts and more
• It’s easy to search for properties with our in-depth sort and filter options
• See the property’s location at a glance with our map view
• Read verified guest reviews
• Compare the features and prices of your favourite properties that you’ve saved

FAST, EASY AND SECURE BOOKINGS
• Pay now or later—you choose whether you want to pay online or at the property
• Save your payment details securely to book future stays even more quickly

ENJOY YOUR STAY
• Get booking confirmation and check-in notifications

*Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. Details on the app.

**Secret Prices are available to Hotels.com app users, Hotels.com® Rewards members and individuals who unlock Secret Prices by subscribing to Hotels.com by email. Available on selected hotels and selected dates only. Subject to the full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html

***Members aged 18+. When you book and stay 1 night at eligible properties, you’ll get 1 stamp. Collect 10 stamps and get a reward night. Reward night value based on average daily rate of 10 stamps (excluding taxes/fees). Taxes/fees payable on reward night. A redemption fee applies unless redeemed on app. Booking exclusions apply. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html.

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.

title: Hotels.com: Book Hotel & Holiday Rental Deals!

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
Book on the Hotels.com app and we’ll help get a Covid vaccine to someone who needs it most.

For every eligible Hotels.com booking, Expedia, Inc. will donate $2 USD, up to $12 million USD, in support of UNICEF’s global COVID-19 response. Expedia, Inc. pledges a minimum donation of $10 million USD. Certain eligibility criteria apply. Go to http://uk.hotels.com/page/returntotravel/?pos=HCOM_UK&locale=en_GB for complete programme terms. Learn more about UNICEF's work at www.unicef.org

When you’re ready to travel, take our app with you. After all, it’s your perfect travel companion.

SAVINGS & LAST-MINUTE TRAVEL DEALS ON OUR APP
• Get instant access to Secret Prices*! Save an extra 10% on thousands of properties (hotels, holiday rentals, etc.) worldwide
• ‘Tonight’s local deals’ feature on our app is a great way to save on last-minute hotel bookings

• Enjoy flexible booking options on most hotels*
• Search and compare travel deals—and hotel and holiday rental prices—before booking your trip

OUR APP IS EVEN MORE REWARDING
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward night on us
• Love reward nights? You can get them faster on our app with exclusive offers on hotel and properties alike
• You won’t pay a fee to redeem your reward nights on our app—and there are no blackout dates

• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from major hotel chains and beach resorts to villas, apartments and more
• Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at VIP Access properties

MORE THAN JUST HOTELS
• We do more than just hotels! Easily find holiday rentals, apartments, luxury resorts, B&Bs, motels, hostels and more on our app—we have every kind of property for almost every kind of trip. So, whether it’s a hotel for a short business trip or a holiday rental for a long holiday, choose from over 800,000 properties worldwide.
• Filter by theme for different types of trips
• See the hotel or holiday rental location on a map and read verified guest reviews
• Save your favourite hotels, holiday rentals, resorts and more

FAST, EASY & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP
• It only takes a few taps to book your travel.
• Pay now or later on most hotels
• Save your payment details to book future trips even faster

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION
• Save your confirmation and access your hotel or holiday rental booking details anytime—even offline
• Easily manage your hotel or holiday rental booking on the go
• Contact us or the hotel or holiday rental owner directly from the app
• Opt in for push notifications and we’ll send you updates about your stay

* Hotels.com® Rewards Members 18+. When you book and stay 1 night at eligible properties, you’ll get 1 stamp. Collect 10 stamps and get a reward night. Reward night value based on average daily rate of 10 stamps (excluding taxes/fees). Taxes/fees payable on reward night. Booking exclusions apply. Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24–48 hours before check-in. See property pages on the app for details. Secret Prices are available to Hotels.com app users, members and email subscribers. Available on selected hotels and selected dates only. Subject to the full terms and conditions: https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html

• Search and compare travel deals and hotel and holiday rental prices before booking your trip

OUR APP IS EVEN MORE REWARDING
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward night on us
• Love reward nights? You can get them faster on our app with app-exclusive offers on hotel and properties alike
• You don’t pay any fees to redeem your reward nights on our app—and there are no blackout dates

• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from major hotel chains and beach resorts to villas, apartments and more
• Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at VIP Access properties

MORE THAN JUST HOTELS
• We do more than just hotels! Easily find holiday rentals, apartments, luxury resorts, B&Bs, motels, hostels and more on our app—we’ve got every kind of property for almost every kind of trip. So, whether it’s a hotel for a short business trip or a holiday rental for a long holiday, choose from over 800,000 properties worldwide.
• Filter by theme for different types of trips.
• See the hotel or holiday rental location on a map and read verified guest reviews
• Save your favourite hotels, holiday rentals, resorts and more

FAST, EASY & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP
• It only takes a few taps to book your travel.
• Pay now or later on most hotels
• Save your payment details to book future trips even faster

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION
• Save your confirmation and access your hotel or holiday rental booking details anytime—even offline
• Easily manage your hotel or holiday rental booking on the go
• Contact us or the hotel or holiday rental owner directly from the app
• Opt in to push notifications and we’ll send you updates about your stay""

*Hotels.com Rewards is open only to individuals who are eighteen (18) and older. When you book and stay 1 night at eligible properties, you’ll get 1 stamp. Collect 10 stamps and you’ll get 1 reward night to redeem at a Hotels.com Rewards eligible pre-pay property (as identified on the site). The maximum value of the reward night is the average daily rate of your ten (10) stamps collected, excluding taxes and applicable fees. The value of your reward night doesn’t count towards any applicable taxes or fees. Excludes package bookings (where available) and bookings made using a coupon. Your reward nights and/or your collected stamps will expire if you have not collected a stamp and/or redeemed a reward night using your Hotels.com® Rewards account in the previous 12 months. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html. Member Prices are available to Hotels.com app users, Hotels.com Rewards members and individuals who unlock Member Prices by subscribing to Hotels.com by email. Available on selected hotels and selected dates only. Subject to full terms and conditions https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html. Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24–48 hours before check-in. See property pages on our app for details.

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation and advertising. By downloading our app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html
descriptionShort: Find the perfect place for your trip with last-minute hotel and travel deals!

descriptionShort: Find the perfect place for your trip with last-minute hotel and travel deals!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: In this update, we’ve reintroduced the ability to access trip information for bookings you’ve made while travelling in different countries. Thanks for using the Hotels.com app to find your perfect somewhere.

title: Hotels.com: Book Hotels & More

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
Our app is even more rewarding for Hotels.com™ Rewards members! You can get to your next reward* night faster with app-exclusive offers. And make sure you opt in to notifications so you don't miss out.

When you’re ready to travel, take our Hotels.com app with you. After all, it’s your perfect travel companion.

SAVINGS & LAST-MINUTE TRAVEL DEALS ON OUR APP
• Get instant access to Member Prices*! Save an average of 15% on thousands of hotels worldwide! That’s real savings, right now.
• Save on last-minute bookings with our app

• Enjoy the flexibility of free cancellation on most hotels*
• Search and compare travel deals and hotel and vacation rental prices before booking your trip

OUR APP IS EVEN MORE REWARDING
• Collect 10 stamps, get 1 reward night on us
• Love reward nights? You can get them faster on our app with app-exclusive offers on hotel and properties alike
• You don’t pay any fees to redeem your reward nights on our app—and there are no blackout dates

• Redeem your reward nights just about anywhere: from major hotel chains and beach resorts to villas, apartments and more
• Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra travel benefits at VIP Access properties

MORE THAN JUST HOTELS
• We do more than just hotels! Easily find vacation rentals, apartments, luxury resorts, B&Bs, motels, hostels and more on our app—we’ve got every kind of property for almost every kind of trip. So, whether it’s a hotel for a short business trip or a vacation rental for a long vacation, choose from over 800,000 properties worldwide.
• Filter by theme for different types of trips.
• See the hotel or vacation rental location on a map and read verified guest reviews
• Save your favourite hotels, vacation rentals, resorts and more

FAST, EASY & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP
• It only takes a few taps to book your travel.
• Pay now or later on most hotels
• Save your payment details to book future trips even faster

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION

title:

2024.13.0

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
Find and book your perfect somewhere with the Hotels.com app.

GET REWARDED THROUGH OUR APP

- Access Member Prices* of 10% or more on over 100,000 hotels worldwide.
- Earn rewards on over 500,000 stays.
- Rewards can add up fast when you have the choice of staying at over 500,000 eligible properties worldwide—so you can get rewarded while you sleep.
- Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra perks at select VIP Access properties.

FIND THE HOTEL THAT’S JUST RIGHT FOR YOU

- Choose from over 500,000 properties worldwide.
- Whether you’re planning a short hotel stay, last minute weekend getaway, long holiday, business trip, or anything in between, we have a property for every kind of travel.
- Enjoy the flexibility of free cancellation on most hotels**.
- Compare hotel prices, ratings and amenities side-by-side using our comparison tool.
- Use Trip Planner to organise your travel plans in one place. Save your favourite hotels, holiday rentals, resorts and more, and share these with friends and family.
- See the hotel or holiday rental location on a map and read verified guest reviews.

FAST, EASY, & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP

- It only takes a few taps to book your hotel.
- Pay now or later on most hotels.
- Save your payment details to book future trips even faster.
- Last minute hotel booking.

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION

- Save your confirmation and access your hotel or holiday rental booking details anytime – even offline.
- Easily manage your hotel or holiday rental booking on the go.
- Contact us or the hotel or holiday rental owner directly from the app.
- Opt-in for push notifications and we’ll send you updates about your hotel stay.

*Member Prices are available on select hotels to logged in members and app users. The discount will be applied to the price of selected hotels (excluding applicable taxes and other fees). Subject to terms and conditions, see site for details.

**Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. See property pages on our app for details.

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation, and advertising. By downloading our hotel app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.

title:
Hotels.com: Book Hotels & More
2024.15.0

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
Hotels.com™ リワード会員なら、アプリ予約でもっと旅がお得に ! アプリ限定の割引やキャンペーンで、あっという間にボーナスステイ*を獲得できます。さらに、通知をオンにすればお得情報を見逃すこともありません !

次の旅行は Hotels.com アプリにおまかせ ! 頼れる旅のパートナーとして、皆さんをサポートします。

アプリならお得なプランや直前割引が満載
•アプリなら、お得な会員価格*に今すぐアクセス可能 ! 世界中の数千件もの宿泊施設が平均 15% OFF ! さっそくチェックしてお得に予約しよう !
• アプリで直前予約もお得

• ほとんどのホテルでキャンセル料無料のプランをご用意*
• ホテルやバケーションレンタルの料金プランを検索・比較して予約

Hotels.com アプリならさらにお得 !
• スタンプ 10 個で 1 泊ボーナス
• ボーナスステイでお得に宿泊したい方は、アプリ限定の割引やキャンペーンで、あっという間ボーナスステイを獲得
• アプリでボーナスステイをご利用の場合は特典利用手数料なし & 適用除外日なし

• ボーナスステイは、大手のホテルチェーンからビーチリゾート、ヴィラ、アパートメントなど、あらゆる宿でご利用可能
• Silver & Gold 会員様には VIP Access 提携施設で追加特典をご用意

ホテル以外の宿も Hotels.com にお任せ
• Hotels.com アプリでは、バケーションレンタル、アパートメント、リゾート、その他さまざまな宿泊施設を幅広く掲載。あらゆるタイプの旅行に最適な宿が簡単に見つかります。宿の数は世界各国に約 80 万件。短期の出張から長期休暇まで、さまざまなニーズにぴったりの滞在先が揃います。
• 旅のテーマやタイプで宿の絞り込みが可能
• 地図表示でホテルやバケーションレンタルの位置を確認できるほか、宿泊者限定の口コミも掲載
• お気に入りのホテル、バケーションレンタル、リゾートなどの宿を簡単に保存

アプリ予約はサクッと、かんたん、安全に
• わずか数回のタップで旅行の予約が完了
• ほとんどのホテルで「事前払い」と「現地払い」を選択可
• お支払い情報を保存すると、次回からの予約がよりスムーズに

Hotels.com アプリは頼れる旅のパートナー
• 予約確認通知を保存して、いつでもどこでも、オフラインでも、ホテルやバケーションレンタルの予約情報を簡単にチェック
• 外出先でも、ホテルやバケーションレンタルの予約を簡単に管理
• アプリから弊社やホテル、バケーションレンタルのオーナーに直接お問い合わせが可能
• プッシュ通知をオンにすると、予約の最新情報を受信

* Hotels.com リワードは、18 歳以上の個人のみを対象としています。対象の宿泊施設を予約し宿泊すると、1 泊につきスタンプが 1 個たまります。スタンプが 10 個たまると、Hotels.com リワード対象の事前払い (サイトに表示あり) の宿泊施設で利用できる 1 泊分のボーナスステイが付与されます。ボーナスステイの金額は、スタンプ 10 個の宿泊料金 (税およびサービス料を除く) の 1 泊あたりの平均金額を上限とします。ボーナスステイの金額を、税またはサービス料のお支払いに利用することはできません。パッケージ予約 (販売されている地域) およびクーポンを利用した予約は対象外です。12 か月間、Hotels.com™リワードのアカウントを利用してスタンプをためなかった場合、またはボーナスステイを利用しなかった場合、それまでに獲得したボーナスステイおよびスタンプは無効となります。利用規約全文 (https://www.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html) が適用されます。会員価格は、Hotels.com アプリ ユーザー、 Hotels.com リワード会員、および Hotels.com ニュースレター会員になり、会員価格へのアクセス権を得たお客様のみご利用いただけます。対象の宿泊施設および期間にのみご利用可能です。利用規約全文 (https://www.hotels.com/customer_care/terms_conditions.html) が適用されます。キャンセル料無料のホテルを多数掲載していますが、一部のホテルは、チェックイン日の 24 ～ 48 時間前までにキャンセルすることを条件としています。詳細は、アプリの宿泊施設のページをご確認ください。
Hotels.com アプリでは、データ分析、パーソナライゼーション、マーケティングの目的で情報を使用しています。アプリのダウンロードをもって、弊社のプライバシーポリシーおよび Cookie ポリシー (https://jp.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html) に同意したものとみなされます。
descriptionShort: 理想の宿がすぐ見つかる ! ホテル & 旅行の直前予約はアプリにおまかせ !

Hotels.com: Book Hotels & More
2024.34.0

creator: Hotels.com LP
descriptionHtml:
Find and book your perfect somewhere with the Hotels.com app.

GET REWARDED THROUGH OUR APP

- Access Member Prices* of 10% or more on over 100,000 hotels worldwide.
- Earn rewards on over 500,000 stays.
- Rewards can add up fast when you have the choice of staying at over 500,000 eligible properties worldwide—so you can get rewarded while you sleep.
- Silver and Gold members can enjoy extra perks at select VIP Access properties.

FIND THE HOTEL THAT’S JUST RIGHT FOR YOU

- Choose from over 500,000 properties worldwide.
- Whether you’re planning a short hotel stay, last minute weekend getaway, long holiday, business trip, or anything in between, we have a property for every kind of travel.
- Enjoy the flexibility of free cancellation on most hotels**.
- Compare hotel prices, ratings and amenities side-by-side using our comparison tool.
- Use Trip Planner to organise your travel plans in one place. Save your favourite hotels, holiday rentals, resorts and more, and share these with friends and family.
- See the hotel or holiday rental location on a map and read verified guest reviews.

FAST, EASY, & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP

- It only takes a few taps to book your hotel.
- Pay now or later on most hotels.
- Save your payment details to book future trips even faster.
- Last minute hotel booking.

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION

- Save your confirmation and access your hotel or holiday rental booking details anytime – even offline.
- Easily manage your hotel or holiday rental booking on the go.
- Contact us or the hotel or holiday rental owner directly from the app.
- Opt-in for push notifications and we’ll send you updates about your hotel stay.

*Member Prices are available on select hotels to logged in members and app users. The discount will be applied to the price of selected hotels (excluding applicable taxes and other fees). Subject to terms and conditions, see site for details.

**Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. See property pages on our app for details.

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation, and advertising. By downloading our hotel app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.
descriptionShort: Find the perfect place for your trip with last-minute hotel and travel deals!

- Join One Key™, our travel program that unlocks a world of instant benefits and perks.
- Earn OneKeyCash™*** and use this whenever you want and instantly save on your next trip.
- One Key Silver, Gold and Platinum members can enjoy extra perks at select VIP Access properties.

FIND THE HOTEL THAT’S JUST RIGHT FOR YOU

- Choose from over 500,000 properties worldwide.
- Whether you’re planning a short hotel stay, last minute weekend getaway, long holiday, business trip, or anything in between, we have a property for every kind of travel.
- Enjoy the flexibility of free cancellation on most hotels**.
- Compare hotel prices, ratings and amenities side-by-side using our comparison tool.
- Use Trip Planner to organise your travel plans in one place. Save your favourite hotels, holiday rentals, resorts and more, and share these with friends and family.
- See the hotel or holiday rental location on a map and read verified guest reviews.

FAST, EASY, & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP

- It only takes a few taps to book your hotel.
- Pay now or later on most hotels.
- Save your payment details to book future trips even faster.
- Last minute hotel booking.

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION

- Save your confirmation and access your hotel or holiday rental booking details anytime – even offline.
- Easily manage your hotel or holiday rental booking on the go.
- Contact us or the hotel or holiday rental owner directly from the app.
- Opt-in for push notifications and we’ll send you updates about your hotel stay.

- Access Member Prices* of 10% or more on over 100,000 hotels worldwide.
- Join One Key™, our travel program that unlocks a world of instant benefits and perks.
- Earn OneKeyCash™*** and use this whenever you want and instantly save on your next trip.
- One Key Silver, Gold and Platinum members can enjoy extra perks at select VIP Access properties.

FIND THE HOTEL THAT’S JUST RIGHT FOR YOU

- Choose from over 500,000 properties worldwide.
- Whether you’re planning a short hotel stay, last minute weekend getaway, long holiday, business trip, or anything in between, we have a property for every kind of travel.
- Enjoy the flexibility of free cancellation on most hotels**.
- Compare hotel prices, ratings and amenities side-by-side using our comparison tool.
- Use Trip Planner to organise your travel plans in one place. Save your favourite hotels, holiday rentals, resorts and more, and share these with friends and family.
- See the hotel or holiday rental location on a map and read verified guest reviews.

FAST, EASY, & SECURE BOOKING ON OUR APP

- It only takes a few taps to book your hotel.
- Pay now or later on most hotels.
- Save your payment details to book future trips even faster.
- Last minute hotel booking.

OUR APP IS YOUR PERFECT TRAVEL COMPANION

- Save your confirmation and access your hotel or holiday rental booking details anytime – even offline.
- Easily manage your hotel or holiday rental booking on the go.
- Contact us or the hotel or holiday rental owner directly from the app.
- Opt-in for push notifications and we’ll send you updates about your hotel stay.

*Member Prices are available on select hotels to logged in members and app users. The discount will be applied to the price of selected hotels (excluding applicable taxes and other fees). Subject to terms and conditions, see site for details.

**Free cancellation on most hotels. Some hotels require you to cancel at least 24-48 hours before check-in. See property pages on our app for details.

***OneKeyCash™ is not redeemable for cash and can only be used on Expedia, Hotels.com and Vrbo.

The Hotels.com app uses information for analytics, personalisation, and advertising. By downloading our hotel app, you agree to our privacy and cookies policies https://uk.hotels.com/customer_care/privacy.html.
